title: How benchmarking can improve business reengineering
items.abstract: <jats:p>Many managers consider business reengineering and benchmarking as separate avenues to be pursued. However, Xerox manager Theodor Richman tells how to marry the two processes and reap synergistic benefits by combining them into a new methodology for implementing change.</jats:p>

title: Applying information technology to reengineering
items.abstract: <jats:p>Information technology (IT) makes business process reengineering possible—and makes it worthwhile. For example, PC and network technologies facilitate simplified processes, promote decentralized decision making, and empower front line employees. So IT and reengineering should be seen as Siamese twins—don't expect to get far with one without paying close attention to the other.</jats:p>
